body:
Dear all,
I'm currently working with a glazing manufacturer who is providing me with
glazing properties in .is and .brdf files.
I've used xml files previously in Radiance to work with BSDF primitives
and I wondered if some of you have ever come across these extensions and
knew if they can be converted into a readable format by Radiance.
Thanks in advance,
Regards,
Thibault



42-43 Gloucester Crescent
London
NW1 7PE
T +44 (0) 20 7267 5161
F +44 (0) 20 7482 0329
maxfordham.com
